snippet.title: HARPAGUN - Official Reveal Trailer!
snippet.description:
___________________________________________________________________________
Harpagun is a fast-paced VR shooter where you smash alien critters, argue with your dysfunctional crew, and destroy everything in sight. Use weapons or everyday objects with a gravity ray to wreak havoc. Built for VR, it delivers chaotic fun, immersive combat, and a wild, hilarious storyline.

Go wishlist now on PSVR 2, Meta Quest or Steam VR

Meta Quest: https://www.meta.com/en-gb/experiences/harpagun/8927242620622679/
PlayStation VR2: https://store.playstation.com/pl-pl/concept/10012605
Steam VR: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3209980/Harpagun/
__

Check our other channels and follow us wherever it is most convenient for you :) 

DISCORD: https://discord.gg/ZXK7nntGep - the easiest way to chat with devs
TWITTER (X): https://twitter.com/somerandgames
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/somethingrandomvr/
FANPAGE: https://www.facebook.com/somethingrandomgames
TIKTOK: https://www.tiktok.com/@somethingrandomgames


#gamedev #vr #fps #harpagun #toytrains
